tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE body_camera_footage (
    footage_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    officer_id UUID,
    incident_date DATE,
    file_path VARCHAR(255),
    location TEXT,
    resolution VARCHAR(10),
    duration TIME,
    tags JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE body_camera_videos (
    video_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    officer_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location TEXT,
    video_duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    officer_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    outcome TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE footage_analysis (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    video_id UUID,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    analyst_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
